alert.note: Alert for Fairfield; Newberry (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 15 at 3:56PM EDT until August 15 at 4:30PM EDT by NWS Columbia
info.description: The National Weather Service in Columbia has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Fairfield County in central South Carolina... Northeastern Newberry County in central South Carolina... * Until 430 PM EDT. * At 355 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Newberry, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to trees and powerlines. * Locations impacted include... Newberry, VC Summer Nuclear Station, Fairfield County Airport, Monticello, Blair, Jenkinsville, Pomaria, Lebanon Fire Station, US- 176 and SC- 34 Crossroads, Henderson Island, Rion, Maybington Fire Station, and Enoree Ranger District Office. This includes Interstate 26 between mile markers 71 and 79. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
